## BundleItemOption interface

BundleItemOption defines characteristics and options for a specific bundle item.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BundleItemOption 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [can\_change\_quantity?](./magento-api.bundleitemoption.can_change_quantity.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Boolean'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates whether the customer can change the number of items for this option. |
|  [id?](./magento-api.bundleitemoption.id.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The ID assigned to the bundled item option. |
|  [is\_default?](./magento-api.bundleitemoption.is_default.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Boolean'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates whether this option is the default option. |
|  [label?](./magento-api.bundleitemoption.label.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The text that identifies the bundled item option. |
|  [position?](./magento-api.bundleitemoption.position.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> When a bundle item contains multiple options, the relative position of this option compared to the other options. |
|  [price\_type?](./magento-api.bundleitemoption.price_type.md) | Maybe&lt;[PriceTypeEnum](./magento-api.pricetypeenum.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> One of FIXED, PERCENT, or DYNAMIC. |
|  [price?](./magento-api.bundleitemoption.price.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Float'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The price of the selected option. |
|  [product?](./magento-api.bundleitemoption.product.md) | Maybe&lt;[ProductInterface](./magento-api.productinterface.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Contains details about this product option. |
|  [qty?](./magento-api.bundleitemoption.qty.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Float'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates the quantity of this specific bundle item. |
|  [quantity?](./magento-api.bundleitemoption.quantity.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Float'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates the quantity of this specific bundle item. |
|  [uid](./magento-api.bundleitemoption.uid.md) | Scalars\['ID'\] | The unique ID for a <code>BundleItemOption</code> object. |
